REST API repository Contacts_book¶

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.create_contact(body: ContactMoedels, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Creates a new contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactMoedels) – The data for the contact to create.

  • user (User) – The user to create the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The newly created contact .

Return type:

Contact

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.read_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session)¶

Retrieves a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user from the database.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The contact with the specified ID, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.read_contact_by_email(email: str, user: User, db: Session)¶

The read_contacts function return contact by email for a specific user from the database.

  • email (str) – The email of the contact to retrieve.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The Contact with the email, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.read_contact_days_to_birthday(db: Session, days_to_birthday: int)¶

The read_contact_days_to_birthday function return contacts whose birthday one week from today.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The Contacts whose birthday one week, or None if it does not exist.

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.read_contacts(user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

The read_contacts function returns a list of contacts.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.remove_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Removes a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user to remove the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The removed contact, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

async jwt_na_fast_api.repository.contacts_book.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactsBase, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

  • body (ContactsBase) – The updated data for the contact.

  • user (User) – The user to update the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The updated contact, or None if it does not exist.

  • db (Session) – The database session.
